title: PolylineMaterial
description: A definition of how a polyline is colored or shaded.

solidColor.description: A material that fills the line with a solid color, which may be translucent.

polylineOutline.description: A material that fills the line with a color and outline.

polylineArrow.description: A material that fills the line with an arrow.

polylineDash.description: A material that fills the line with a pattern of dashes.

polylineGlow.description: A material that fills the line with a glowing color.

image.description: A material that fills the line with an image.

grid.description: A material that fills the line with a grid.

stripe.description: A material that fills the line with alternating colors.

checkerboard.description: A material that fills the line with a checkerboard pattern.
